abstract: Frosted, ridden by jockey Joel Rosario, wins Pennsylvania Derby.
lead_paragraph: Frosted rallied from fifth place under the jockey Joel Rosario and won the $1 million Pennsylvania Derby by two lengths over Iron Fist at Parx Racing in Bensalem, Pa.
snippet: Frosted rallied from fifth place under the jockey Joel Rosario and won the $1 million Pennsylvania Derby by two lengths over Iron Fist at Parx Racing in Bensalem, Pa.
